coded_answer.p: I would be pleased to help you aboutwith all your questions and I will provide you with somethe information which you need as muchfar as I can.

BeforBefore you leavleave from England, I suggest you to visitvisit the cannalscanals and small villages around Basingstoke. You could findhave the opportunatyopportunity to see the country life.

I have to admit that whoever invented the cars and transportation vehicles didcame up with the most respectable inventioninventions of the wordworld. I say that itthey must be the most important thingthings for us because they save our timestime passing so fast.

Can you deny how quickly we get somewhere by car or by bus.? May beMaybeIt is maybe 10 times as quick as getting somewhere on foot. Try to imagine your life without having anyofany of them. Wouldn't it be unbarableunbearable and painful.?

CeartainlyCertainly it would be just like mine. Because because I live in a rural area, far from any village, town, or city centercentre. TheTo reach the nearest civilization takes me 1 hour on foot. I have no car, and no local bus service to use. Even comeingcoming to Basingstoke seems like aan international journey to me. And ofcauseof course this stops me everytime to live sociable life. But also I'm aware of that the time flies for me. I must do whatever I want beforbefore it is too late. And I have to confess the invention of the car was the most usefulluseful invention for the humanity.
